snippet: Decisions for transplants are best left to medical professionals, not politicians or judges.
abstract: Editorial holds cases of two desperately ill children in need of lung transplants highlight need to examine criteria used to determine eligibility for such transplants; contends change by Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network to rules dictating whether children can access adult lungs does not address underlying problem of dearth of organs to meet high demand.
lead_paragraph: Decisions for transplants are best left to medical professionals, not politicians or judges.
